name: R. I. P. Tour
description:
Set in the nostalgic year of 2019 when being kidnapped by murderers would be the worst of your problems, R. I. P. Tour is an episodic visual novel in which thirteen would-be party-goers are about to have a hELK of a bad Halloween. Drugged and kidnapped, they must vote on who among them will be sent to the Doom Room, where they will be forced to fight to the death with one of their captors.

The demo is chapter one of a four part story.

Features
  • Original soundtrack
  • Customizable character including name, pronouns, body type, and one of up to four different favorite unicorns!
  • Stars a cast of thirteen 18-to-20-somethings, three
    gas-mask-wearing killers, and one cute little pooch... but not for long*!
  • Multiple endings! Like, seriously a lot of endings! You die in most of them!
  • Murder! Mayhem! Betrayal! Swearing! Terrible puns!

*Don't worry, the dog will be okay.
